title: Orchid and Rock
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

ULC, in Japan ULC: {Baigai}
description: pink lobster-shaped rock surrounded in back by wisps of graceful grasses and foliage; blossoming grey flowers at L and R sides of rock
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
